org.jclouds.joyent.sdc.v6_5.features
Interface MachineClient

public interface MachineClient

Provides synchronous access to Machine.

Author:
Gerald Pereira
See Also:
MachineAsyncClient, api doc

Method Summary
 Machine createMachine(String name, String packageSDC, String dataset, CreateServerOptions... options)
           
 void deleteMachine(String id)
          Allows you to delete a machine (the machine must be stopped before it can be deleted).
 Machine getMachine(String id)
          Gets the details for an individual machine.
 Set<Machine> listMachines()
          Lists all machines we have on record for your account.
 void rebootMachine(String id)
          Allows you to reboot a machine.
 void resizeMachine(String id, String packageSDC)
          Allows you to resize a machine.
 void startMachine(String id)
          Allows you to boot up a machine.
 void stopMachine(String id)
          Allows you to shut down a machine.
 

Method Detail

listMachines

Set<Machine> listMachines()
Lists all machines we have on record for your account.

Returns:
an account's associated server objects.

getMachine

Machine getMachine(String id)
Gets the details for an individual machine.

Parameters:
id - the id of the machine
Returns:

createMachine

Machine createMachine(String name,
                      String packageSDC,
                      String dataset,
                      CreateServerOptions... options)
Parameters:
name - friendly name for this machine; default is a randomly generated name
packageSDC - Name of the package to use on provisioning; default is indicated in ListPackages
dataset - dataset URN; default is indicated in ListDatasets
options - optional parameters to be passed into the machine creation request
Returns:
the newly created machine

stopMachine

void stopMachine(String id)
Allows you to shut down a machine.

Parameters:
id - the id of the machine to stop

startMachine

void startMachine(String id)
Allows you to boot up a machine.

Parameters:
id - the id of the machine to start

rebootMachine

void rebootMachine(String id)
Allows you to reboot a machine.

Parameters:
id - the id of the machine to reboot

resizeMachine

void resizeMachine(String id,
                   String packageSDC)
Allows you to resize a machine. (Works only for smart machines)

Parameters:
id - the id of the machine to resize
packageSDC - the package to use for the machine

deleteMachine

void deleteMachine(String id)
Allows you to delete a machine (the machine must be stopped before it can be deleted).

Parameters:
id - the id of the machine to delete
